text: ki mai bhee us par chalan phir agar ye log (is par bhee) na maanen to samajh lo ki ye log bas apanee hava va havas kee pairavee karate hai aur jo shakhs khuda kee hidaayat ko chhod kar apanee hava va havas kee pairavee karate hai usase jyaada gumaraah kaun hoga beshak khuda sarakash logon ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
